item.title: Say Goodbye to Your Loved Ones: Discover Obituaries from Simon Coleman Funeral Home in Richwood, WV on Facebook!
item.description: Introduction Saying goodbye to a loved one can be very difficult An obituary is a way to honor their life and share memories with family and friends Simon Coleman Funeral Home in Richwood, West Virginia, offers obituaries through their Facebook page Read on to learn more about the obituaries available from Simon Coleman Funeral Home and the benefits of discovering them What is an obituary? An obituary is a written notice of a personâ€™s death.
